title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Camping in the Area
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Copper Center Area     Camping in the Area              Camping in the Area       Camping in the Copper Center Area In the Copper Center Area, there are no places to camp in Wrangell-St. Elias National Park. However, there are numerous other options for camping in this location, including private campgrounds and other public land agency campgrounds. For a list of private campgrounds in the area, visit the Lodging in the Area web page. For camping options on other public lands near this part of Wrangell-St. Elias National Park & Preserve, contact the following land management agencies: Ahtna Native Corporation P.O. Box 649, Glennallen, AK 99588 (907) 822-3476 Bureau of Land Management - Glennallen Field Office P.O. Box 147, Glennallen, AK 99588 (907) 822-3217 Chugach National Forest - Cordova District P.O. Box 280, Cordova, AK 99574 (907) 424-7661 Alaska State Parks P.O. Box 107001, Anchorage, AK 99510 (907) 762-2261 Map of Local Public Campgrounds(pdf format, 2 MB): This is a highly detailed 22 x 17 inch map which depicts public campgrounds in Southcentral Alaska.
